title: LFT Gold 3 Supp/ADC main
body:
Looking for a team, can play most nights.

IGN Ballista
Do Have skype
Age 21

Champ pool
ADC: All, Priority picks (Jinx, Lucian, Vayne, Draven, Kog)
Support: Thresh,Naut ,Blitz,Braum, Nami

Willing to learn new Champs, adapt to a new role. Previously played top lane.

replies.body: hi im trying to group a few ppl together if ur keen. ill add u

hey,

I'm currently looking to join/start a team as well. Add me in game and we can play a few to see how our synergy goes.
IGN: span
